name: Race Game (emircanisanc)
description:
In a racing game, you have one blue and one orange car, each in a different lane. At the start of the game, the blue car starts to move clockwise, and the orange car starts to move counterclockwise. Blue and orange cars will continue to circulate at Waypoints in their respective lanes.

If the cars are in the same lane, you must switch the orange car to a different lane with the SPACE or LEFT MOUSE CLICK to avoid hitting the blue car. The orange car changes lanes randomly between 3 and 5 seconds. You can not change lane while already changing.

Sounds from Royalty Free Music Download - Pixabay
